name: Nordic Capital VIII Limited
goal:
Nordic Capital is a leader in Nordic and Northern European private equity investments.
Nordic Capital invests in all industries and sectors and its funds focus on large to medium sized buy-outs, and has a dedicated healthcare franchise, where we have extensive experience, outstanding investment track record and a reputation among management teams for deep industry insight.
interests: Competition, Financial Stability, Financial Services and Capital Markets Union
euInitiatives: Nordic Capital's initiatives include Credit management services, credit asset management services, financial systems surveillance.
